00022 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023     Uint8CommitArray
00024     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00025 // Array is used for Provider commit stuff
00026 class Uint8CommitArray 
00027 {
00028     public:
00029         void Clear() { 
00030             for(INT j=0; j<c_pb_max_file_type_per_record; j++) {
00031                 m_val[j] = 0;
00032             }
00033             m_set.Clear();
00034         }
00035         void Set(UINT idx, UINT8 id) { 
00036             m_val[idx] = id;
00037             m_set.SetTrue(idx);
00038         }
00039         UINT8 Get(UINT idx) const { 
00040             return m_val[idx];
00041         }
00042         BOOLEAN WasChanged(UINT idx) const { 
00043             return m_set.GetBit(idx);
00044         }
00045         BOOLEAN IsUsed() const { 
00046             return m_set.Get()!=0;
00047         }
00048 
00049         UINT8       m_val[c_pb_max_file_type_per_record];
00050         BitField16  m_set; 
00051 };
00052 
00053 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054     PhoneNumberCommitArray
00055     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00056 // Array is used for Provider commit stuff
00057 class PhoneNumberCommitArray 
00058 {
00059     public:
00060         void Clear() { 
00061             for(INT j=0; j<c_pb_max_file_type_per_record; j++) {
00062                 m_val[j].Clear();
00063             }
00064             m_set.Clear();
00065         }
00066         void Set(UINT idx, const PhoneNumber & phno) { 
00067             m_val[idx] = phno;
00068             m_set.SetTrue(idx);
00069         }
00070         const PhoneNumber & Get(UINT idx) const { 
00071             return m_val[idx];
00072         }
00073         BOOLEAN WasChanged(UINT idx) const { 
00074             return m_set.GetBit(idx);
00075         }
00076         BOOLEAN IsUsed() const { 
00077             return m_set.Get()!=0;
00078         }
00079 
00080         PhoneNumber m_val[c_pb_max_file_type_per_record];
00081         BitField16  m_set; 
00082 };
